name: School Mayhem
description:
Context

This game was done under 48h for a Game JAM themed "Lost and found"

Gameplay

School Mayhem is a 2D roguelite, where the player fight monsters within a shool at night. Clear the 4 floors until reaching the final boss !

Team
  • Mathieu Schmerber: Programming, Art
  • Lucas Deutschmann: Game design
  • Quentin Le Van: Musics
